sentences.sContent: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.sContent: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.sCn: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.sContent: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.sCn: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.sContent: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.sCn: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

sentences.sContent: ...and in that case you're not lost...
...At the top of most hills and mountains are trails living back to civilizations...
...and when you are expected to return...
...and recite something you are memorized to bring your mind to the point where is under control...
...Some team members find it hard to agree on questions like membership and the team’s purpose...
...and until now have only reported minor accidents...
...and formed a new community of people...
...letting go of the safety and security of the past gives us great fear...
...They were very close together and there was a lot of noise and movements...

等等；的确；此外；连…一齐都

trans.tranOther: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way
